clinical_study.brief_title: Study on the Efficacy and Safety of Gelaspan
clinical_study.official_title: Prospective Controlled Randomized Double-blind Multicentre Study in Parallel Groups on the Efficacy and Safety of Gelaspan in Combination With Sterofundin ISO in Comparison With Gelofusine in Combination With Sodium Chloride Braun in Patients Scheduled for Abdominal or Pelvic Surgery

brief_summary.textblock: It is the objective of the study to investigate the efficacy and safety of two different volume replacement regimens with gelatine solutions.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change in base excess from baseline to end of surgery

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change in base excess from baseline to 12 hours after end of surgery
